channel.title: Projects on Arthur Douillard

item.title: C/C++ low-level projects
item.description: Engineering schools last 3 years in France. Before these years students learn for two years a broad science curriculum covering mathematics, algo, physics, electronics… The three years of engineering cover a more specialized subject, for me it was computer science. The first year of my engineering school, EPITA, is intensive. We learn many different subjects about low-level programming and almost weekly have hackathons the whole weekend. During the days we study the theory of computer science (language theory, compiler, graph, algo, some maths, etc.
